overview: The song of the cherries resonates under the combined action of an object striking a round-bottomed mixing bowl and its echo. This short animated piece, created with Patrice Fortier and ground cherries from La société des plantes, is part of a larger project developed with this Kamouraska-based organic seed supplier begun in the fall of 2020: a place where plants and plans (shots) meet despite the apparent distance between the fields and the songs.
title: Le chant des cerises
